name: Wild West:New Frontier to Farm
description:
Welcome to the Wild West!

Howdy, partner! Ready to take your little plot of land and turn it into a prosperous, thriving farm? Then pull on those cowboy boots - it’s time to push your way Westward! Untamed territories, buried treasure and colorful characters - all in the palm of your hand. Transport back into the adventurous past of the Wild West and stake your claim to fun!
• Grow crops like corn and rye, berries and fruit
• Raise and feed cows, chickens, and pigs
• Build a grill, bakery and summer kitchen—and get cooking!
• Sell goods from your farm at the best prices
• Open a mine and get gold and silver
• Chat and collaborate with your friends!

Find fame and farming success in the Wild West!

Features:

• Stunning 3D graphics
• Rotate the camera—inspect your farm from every angle!

On your farm, you can:

• Cultivate useful plants
• Rear and care for cute animals
• Construct your own original farmscape
• Make dishes with produce you grow yourself, using recipes from the Old West
• Develop manufacturing to get wood, stone, gold and silver

The excitement of the Wild West awaits you!
